## FileTree.FileTree.inMemory() method

Creates a new [FileTree](./ts-utils.filetree.filetree.md) instance with accessors for an in-memory file tree.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static inMemory(files: IInMemoryFile[], prefix?: string): Result<FileTree>;
```
